originalText.text: After I started going to Dr. Braverman, I found out two people I knew had been patients of his for years. I wish I had found him sooner, because I would have been spared the problems that were caused by my two previous dentists.  At my first visit I was impressed with Dr. Braverman and his wonderful staff.  Dr. Braverman and the whole team are very professional and he is very thorough.  I needed a lot of work done and now I am pleased with how much better my smile looks and how I feel.  Anyone who needs restoration or cosmetic work done should consider a consultation with Dr. Braverman.  I work in the performing arts and actors who need cosmetic work so their smile looks better on camera, should also consider seeing Dr. Braverman a well.

originalText.text:
Mal Braverman is excellent- gentle and informative about changes I am experiencing as I mature. His team is top notch as well- Mary always takes care of my administrative needs, and Ruth, my hygienist, is informative and thorough and listens to my concerns.
I will return to this dentist again and I recommend them highly.

text.text:

originalText.text: All my life I hated to go to the dentist. Dr Mal Braverman I must say not only the best dentist that I have been to but  a Doctor who makes his patient feel very relaxed. I was taken into his smile studio that alone makes you feel comfortable because it overlooks Central Park. Dr. Braverman explained everything that I needed done unlike other dentist he was not rushed. I MUST SAY IS THE BEST DENTIST IN THE COUNTRY. If you go to him once you he will be your dentist for life.

originalText.text: Dr. Braverman has been my dentist ( through recommendation) for the last few years. He has always taken the time to explain options I have for keeping my teeth healthy. I have had to have 2 repairs done on molars with deep and old fillings. He was able to save the teeth and really do a fabulous job on making them look natural. I know that down the road I will need to have the teeth capped but I appreciate he was able to buy me some time.

text.text: Dr. Braverman has been my dentist ( through recommendation) for the last few years. He has always taken the time to explain options I have for keeping my teeth healthy. originalText.text: Dr Braverman was trying to convince me to replace my bonding (front tooth) with a veneer for 8 years. I finally acquiesced and am so glad I did. Dr Braverman instilled confidence in me that it would match my other tooth - - I had heard if you are doing a front tooth veneer that you have to do both, and this ended up not being the case. There is absolutely no way to tell that my front tooth is not natural. It looks great. He did a great job making the entire process as painless as possible and I am so happy with the result. Highly recommend!
